function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of contagious diseases due to increased interconnectedness and decentralization of society.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of diseases, leading to public health crises and economic disruption.","Mitigation":"Implementation of stringent health regulations, vaccination campaigns, and public health awareness programs.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, IoT devices for health monitoring, and digital communication platforms for health education.","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Government authorities, public health institutions, and technology companies."}]}
